product_name: Regular Fit Cotton Linen Blend Chinos

style:
Walk out in warmer weather in style with these lightweight breathable cotton and linen-blend chinos. They're cut in a roomy regular fit. Neat button and zip fastening, plus belt loops. Side pockets keep your essentials close to hand. 
 
 M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

composition: 52% linen, 48% cotton (exclusive of trimmings), Pocketing (pocket fabric composition) - 80% polyester, 20% cotton
